basics.name: Mario Amé
basics.label: Digital Designer
basics.summary: Designer and leader of digital projects. Entrepreneur and Technical by nature.

work.name: Álterego Agency
work.summary: Acted as main designer and head of IT projects, conceptualizing advertisements, designing audiovisual pieces as well as directing teams and projects.
responsibilities: End-to-end design and development of advertising campaigns.
Production of Audiovisual assets for social media and campaigns.
Project and Account manager, including commercial negotiation with clients.
Audiovisual producer and a campaign strategy consultant.
achievements: Compromiso Foundation: Co-designed the concept for the award-winning advertising campaign #PoniendoseLaCamisetaDelFuturo by @PotreroDigital.

Da Vinci School: Co-produced the audiovisual pieces for BitBang-Fest 2020 and developed the visual identity, branding, and graphic and audiovisual content for social networks, YouTube, and the internal streaming platform.

work.name: Argentine Ministry of Economy
work.summary: Leader of the QA unit for an IT office in Government. I’ve built and developed the team from inception to serve as a pivotal point for all programs and developments within the office.
responsibilities: Conducted thorough testing of public policy systems to identify defects, ensure functionality, and enhance user experience.
Developed and executed comprehensive test plans.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams of developers, designers, business and function analysts and product owners to understand project requirements and ensure alignment with quality standards.
Provided guidance on testing best practices, documentation standards, and process improvements to optimize efficiency.
achievements: Successfully led a manual testing team of three analysts and one automation test developer, establishing efficient testing processes and protocols.

Contributed to the quality assurance of 15 versions of a nationwide public system, dedicated to categorize and certify 95% of all SMEs in Argentina. 
 Official website: https://www.argentina.gob.ar/servicio/registrar-una-pyme

Played a critical role over 30 versions improving the quality of a multi-million-peso nationwide public system, that facilitates the allocation of bonds to capital goods manufacturers in Argentina. 
 Official website: https://www.argentina.gob.ar/servicio/inscribite-en-el-registro-para-fabricantes-de-bienes-de-capital

Assisted PM/POs with client management, addressing high rejection rates over all the programs involved, enhancing relationships by implementing stricter standards for the quantity and severity of defect reports permitted in each QA stance.

work.name: Landrú Foundation
work.summary: Head of the Digital office, leading the development of its main product, the 'Landrú library,' a repository of the artist's artwork.
responsibilities: Worked closely with the Foundation Director to assist in the ideation of the Landrú's digital presence, including defining the scope of IT and multimedia projects.
Coordinated the effort of a small team composed by two developers, a functional analyst, and a UI designer to deliver on project goals and milestones in time.
Carried out the technical feasibility of both proposals and projects, determining roles and skills that were required to deliver each project.
achievements: Implemented 'Landruteca' version 2, an online internal library housing the artist's artwork and comics for corporate distribution. This updated version offers easily categorized access for media implementation, facilitating access to the extensive artwork library for the organization's staff.
Implemented the organization’s official website, landru.org, revitalizing its online presence and adopting a newspaper-style approach to reconnect with the traditionalist audience.

work.name: Freelance
work.summary: Worked closely with clients, I’ve developed tailored solutions including Banners, book covers, stationery, brand books and more.
responsibilities: Provide tailored visual solutions for diverse clients, enhancing brand recognition.
Manage full project lifecycles, ensuring timely delivery and budget adherence.
achievements:
Gutierrez Hospital: Designed brand manual and brand guidelines for a well established volunteer service of a public hospital. 
 View: https://www.behance.net/gallery/152780691/Manual-de-Marca-Voluntarias-del-Hospital-Gutierrez

SPIKA Brewery: Designed a beer can for an emerging brewery in Argentina. 
 View: https://www.behance.net/gallery/175796205/Beer-can-design-Spika-Beer-Company
Designed stationery, flyers, book covers, banners, signs and clothing for a diverse range of clients.

work.name: Argentine Ministry of Production Development
work.summary: Producer for a government program aimed to provide webinars of topics of interest for SMEs.
responsibilities: Conducting virtual training (webinars) for the 'Academia PyME' Program (https://www.argentina.gob.ar/produccion/capacitacion).
Coordinating activity schedules, trainers/coaches for each session, and providing technical assistance for the operation of live streaming platforms.
achievements: Collaborated in the implementation of a fast-paced schedule, delivering three online webinars per week across various topics and trainers.
Received national recognition for the success of our activities from Senior stakeholders at national wide scale.

volunteer.summary: Volunteer coach for the YES Kickstart events in the Wellington Region. Acted as a personal entrepreneurship coach for teams of high school students in the YES program, conducting three coaching sessions.

Developed the okif.org webpage for the foundation, which aims to network and empower graduates from the Otto Krause High School in Buenos Aires worldwide. Additionally, led the development of the organization’s internal database, including its API integration.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills.
highlights: Built with React and Tailwind CSS
Includes a blog and contact form

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: A web application that provides weather information for any location.
highlights: Built with JavaScript and OpenWeatherMap API

projects.name: Task Manager
projects.description: A simple task management app to keep track of daily tasks.

projects.name: E-commerce Site
projects.description: An online store built with Next.js and Stripe for payment processing.
highlights: Product management and shopping cart functionality
